column4: I just installed ubuntu 11.04 on my new ideapad u160 i5 with internal intel hd grafik card. Unfortunately, when I switch the screen settings with the screen dialog, my display goes black and never recovers :( And ideas?
try gnome classic with no effects? :)
also. there was a recent fix disabling some intel thing
here i have the same problem
er. you have same problem in classic with no effects? (using metacity)
there was an intel driver update recently. refresh update manager
